WorkItem.Description:
Talents:
Intensity is now 17/33/50% of spirit, 
Improved Regrowth = Nature's Bounty which works on regrowth and nourish for 5/10/15/20/25% to crit, 
Replenish = Revitalize which now also works on Wild Growth.
Â 
Glyphs:
Glyph of Nourish
Glyph of Wild Growth
WorkItem.Summary: [Tree] Talents and Glyphs not up to date

Comments.Message: I changed Intensity as part of the Moonkin talent tooltip update.

In regard to the tree module:
I'm pretty sure the Intensity talent was already using the new values inside the module and that was only a talent GUI issue, but will check.

We missed the Nature's Bounty change in both the model and GUI, now updated in patch 33188.

The effects of Revitalize isn't being modelled at all, the talent GUI display now updated in patch 33188 though. 

The Glyph of Nourish isn't being modelled yet. Will look at adding that at some time over the weekend, shouldn't be too difficult.

Wild Growth's values are displayed, but its healing isn't being included in the model (only mana and cast time is consumed), thus the Glyph of Wild Growth won't affect modelled healing scores. Will nevertheless look at adding that.

Just committed Patch 33326, which should address the remaining issues here:
Rawr.Tree:
-Added Nourish and Wild Growth Glyph support
-Corrected bug which was preventing Regrowth Glyph from activating
-Added Nightsong Regalia 4 piece Set Bonus
